## Summary Implemented the base HTML template that serves as the foundation for all pages of the donkey website. The template includes comprehensive semantic HTML5 structure with proper accessibility landmarks and modern web standards. ## Key Features Implemented ### üèóÔ∏è Semantic HTML5 Structure - Valid HTML5 doctype declaration - Proper document structure with semantic elements - Template placeholders for dynamic content integration ### ‚ôø Accessibility Features - All required accessibility landmarks (header, main, footer, nav) with descriptive ARIA labels - Skip-to-content link for keyboard navigation that connects to #main-content - Screen reader friendly elements with proper ARIA roles and labels - Semantic navigation with menubar/menuitem roles - Hidden decorative elements properly marked with aria-hidden ### üì± SEO & Performance Optimizations - Comprehensive meta tags including charset, viewport, description, keywords, and author - Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags for social sharing - Canonical URL support for SEO - Resource preloading for critical CSS and JavaScript - Async CSS loading with noscript fallback to prevent FOUC - Favicon and app icon declarations for various devices ### üé® Modern Web Standards - SVG sprite system with reusable icon symbols (menu, close, arrow-right, external) - Structured data with Schema.org JSON-LD for website markup - Progressive enhancement approach with graceful JavaScript fallbacks - Mobile-first responsive design considerations ## Technical Implementation - **File Created:** `src/templates/base.html` (223 lines) - **Template System:** Uses handlebars-style placeholders for dynamic content - **Accessibility Compliance:** WCAG 2.1 Level AA ready structure - **Performance:** Critical CSS inlining placeholder and async loading setup ## Acceptance Criteria Verification ‚úÖ **base.html contains valid HTML5 doctype and semantic structure** - HTML5 doctype declaration present - Semantic elements: header, main, footer, nav, section properly used ‚úÖ **All accessibility landmarks present with ARIA labels** - `
